title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 101.1 - Application and amplification of general certification standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 101.1 - Application and amplification of general certification standards

State Regulations
(a) The general
seed certification standards are basic and together with the following specific
standards constitute the standards for the certification of grass
seed. (b) Section
96.3
of the general standards is
amplified as follows: Classes and sources of certified seed: Certified seed is the progeny of foundation or registered
seed. Only the certified class of seed is eligible for certification by the New

York Seed Improvement Cooperative, Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
101.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
